docs.title: About
docs.text:
Hi!

My name is Mariusz Skomra. I am a QA with 8 years of experience in test automation, both creating new projects from scratch and developing existing ones.

I have programming experience in Java, Kotlin and TypeScript. I have automated GUI, API and database tests using tools such as Selenium, Selenide, RestAssured and Playwright. I have worked with CI/CD tools, integrating them into test projects from scratch and developing existing solutions.

In my day-to-day work I take a shift-left approach, engaging in conversations with developers, analysts and product owners to start testing at the earliest possible stage of project development.

My experience includes working in senior teams as a standalone QA and in teams of people with varying levels of experience. I enjoy learning and exploring new tools and technologies, as well as the opportunity to share knowledge and experience.

docs.text:
• International Software Testing Qualifications Board Foundation Level (ISTQB FL), 2023

docs.title: Automation tester
docs.text:
01.2025 – current

  • Desing of the test plan for UI and API automated tests
  • Migration of existing automated tests project from Codeception (PHP) to Playwright (TypeScript)
  • Development and maintenance of automated tests project
  • Create tools for reporting and notification about tests results

docs.title: Senior Test Engineer
docs.text:
04.2022 – 12.2024

  • Test architect
  • Lead developer
  • Co-designing of the test plan
  • Analysis of the E2E test tool selection
  • Creation from scratch, development and maintenance of databases, API and GUI automated tests projects
  • Creation, development and maintenance of infrastructure for tests projects
  • Integrating tests into a CI/CD process
  • Business analysis of customer requirements
  • Conducting tests using the shift left approach
  • Development of simple backend tasks
  • Active participation in the code review process
  • Working in the English language

docs.title: Technical Leader
docs.text:
04.2022 – 03.2024

  • Supporting the HR department with technical verification in the recruitment process
  • Advice on the selection of training courses for testers, coordination of the necessary activities between management and testers
  • Supporting the professional development of testers

  • Supporting the HR department with technical verification in the recruitment process
  • Supporting the sales department in terms of customer conversations and preparation of ofers
  • Supporting the marketing department regarding content posted on the company blog
  • Advice on the selection of training courses for testers, coordination of the necessary activities between management and testers
  • Supporting the professional development of testers
  • Creation of industry articles (mainly in the field of automated testing) for the company blog
  • Co-creation of the JTester Academy internship program

docs.text:
